articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
articles.title: Renfield review: a movie that doesn’t deserve Nicolas Cage’s Dracula - The Verge
articles.description: Universal’s Renfield — in theaters now — from director Chris McKay is so scattershot and messy that not even Nicolas Cage’s inspired take on Dracula can save it.
articles.content:
Save for Nicolas Cages over-the-top Dracula, almost nothing about Universals Renfield really works the way it could.
ByCharles Pulliam-Moore
Apr 14, 2023, 2:30 PM UTC|Comments
There are a handful … [+5188 chars]
